title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' 2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3. Select xxx as destination5.
OB: When copying a package in jdt.ui3, the destination is shown as '2031. org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open jdt.ui3. 
2. Select a package. 
3. Choose the 'Copy' option. 
4. Verify that the destination is shown correctly as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
